channel.title: ::commands Template?
channel.description: hey, i was wondering if there was a way i could add like a stone or a scroll to pop up and list the rules and commands players can use. when they type ::commands? [PI]

item.title: ::commands Template?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“RuneScar, post:8, topic:425599”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=528255.msg3852081#msg3852081 date=1324099813]

if (command[0].equals("commands")) { final int TEXT_ID = 0; for (int i = 0; i < TEXT_ID; i++) { // Show command interface logic here. } }
[/quote]

Why the fuck u declare ‘‘final’’ do you eventually know where its used for? stupid fuck even using a array in a command is fucking dumb[/quote]
Do you know what final is used for? Do you know what an array is? Because no array is used in there… And he was avoiding spoon-feeding, so please leave.

Read full topic

item.title: ::commands Template?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“RuneScar, post:8, topic:425599”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=528255.msg3852081#msg3852081 date=1324099813]

if (command[0].equals("commands")) { final int TEXT_ID = 0; for (int i = 0; i < TEXT_ID; i++) { // Show command interface logic here. } }
[/quote]

Why the fuck u declare ‘‘final’’ do you eventually know where its used for? stupid fuck even using a array in a command is fucking dumb[/quote]

Calm the fuck down kid you obviously don’t know a thing you’re talking about.

  1. There is NO array in that command.
  2. The final modifier is used because the variable ‘TEXT’ is a constant.

Try to actually know what you’re talking about before you try and flame me.

Read full topic

item.title: ::commands Template?
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:7, topic:425599”]Add this in commands.java

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("commands")) { //change name to whatever, info, donate etc. c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Rampage X -- Player Commands", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::kdr @red@(@gre@checks how many players u have killed@red@)", 8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::players @red@(@gre@Checks how many players are online.@red@)", 8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::changepassword @red@Ex)@gre@ type new pass after command", 8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::credits @red@(@gre@Checks how many Rampage Credits you have.@red@)", 8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::lock@red@(@gre@Locks your Xp. Use ::unlock to disable Xp lock.@red@)", 8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::sit @red@(@gre@Teleports you to Rock Crabs.@red@)", 8152); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::rules @red@(@gre@List of General Rules ingame.@red@)", 8153); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::vote @red@(@gre@Opens up browser to our voting link.@red@)", 8154); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::resetdef @red@(@gre@Sets your defence to level 1.@red@)", 8155); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::redeem @red@(@gre@Voting Rewards@red@)", 8156); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::npckills [id] @red@(@gre@Shows how many nps youve killed@red@)", 8157); //c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::buyticket @red@(@gre@Exchange 500m for a ticket@red@)", 8158); //c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::sellticket @red@(@gre@Exchange one ticket for 500m@red@)", 8159); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8158); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8159); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8160); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8161); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8162); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8163); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8164); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8165); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8166); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8167); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8168); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8169); }[/quote]
